commitResults.messageBody:
Duke class name changed to Tira
String logo description changed

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Duke java to Tira Java

commitResults.messageBody:
Echo feature uses printWriter for efficiency.
Loops as long as no "bye" command is written
Use ArrayList to keep track of the commands.
Add Task class to represent tasks added. Bot messages changed to fit bot personality

Created Deadline, Event, ToDo classes inheriting from Task class.
More abstraction needed in the main Tira class to make the code more readable
Created an addTask method to streamline the task adding process

Modified the runtest.sh file to contain the working directory.
Tested the runtest.sh file.  Added a .trim to eliminate white space around some words in Task.

Handle Error of:
1. Not having the required number of words for the command.
2. The command not in the command list

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more test cases to Automated testing
commitResults.messageBody: Tests for addition of Event, Deadline, and Todo to the List. Tests for marking and unmarking tasks, printing taskList

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level-6 Delete and Revise Test Cases
commitResults.messageBody: Add Delete Task feature to Tira (main class). Add and revised several test cases, remove unrequired white spaces from printed strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add methods to streamline main() code
commitResults.messageBody: Move all the if-else blocks to different methods so that the main() code looks neat. It will potentially allow for future modifications to be easier.
Checks if there is a file with a specific directory in the project root.

commitResults.messageTitle: Revert "Add methods to streamline main() code"
commitResults.messageBody: This reverts commit 1a22a6de37fa684550e77d5c5b799f434b8e61b0.

commitResults.messageTitle: Separate the if-else blocks into methods
commitResults.messageBody: Shifted the if-else blocks to individual static methods so that it is easier to read and modify in the future

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Level - 7 Feature to Save taskList to a file
commitResults.messageBody: Use File, FileReader, and FileWriter

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Tira.txt to test for the Save function
Add Level-8 Dates and Times function
commitResults.messageBody: Modified Deadline and Event task to store LocalDate instead of String for the dates and times. Modified addDeadline() and addEvent() method in Tira to format the correct dates and throw exception if the incorrect format is used.
Created skeleton for the level 8 classes : Storage, Parser, Ui, and TaskList

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify TaskList and Tira to better handle tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Rectified addEvent, which previously didn't have a startDate. This clears the previous bug of addEvent not functioning properly when the start and end dates are provided as inputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Rectify addTask  to handle different commands more efficiently
commitResults.messageBody: AddTask can now call markTask, unmarkTask, addToDo, addDeadline, addEvent, and delete using a single taskType string. Each command will print out a string indicating that the command has been completed.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a Comment in Deadline to test for branch merging
Revert "Add a Comment in Deadline to test for branch merging"
commitResults.messageBody: This reverts commit 95ebe89da6d50ad7ac8122c40fea7935bdd7cdf5.
Add and refined save(), load(), convertToTaskList(), convertTaskToString() method in Storage. Modified Tira class to accommodate for Storage class.

Added show methods for taskList and integrated Ui into the Tira main class.

Fixed a minor bug in Storage class where the formatting of String on txt file was inconsistent.
Created Parser class to handle commands. Modified Tira main class to integrate Parser.
Resolved conflict with Tira.java
Move all the java files into main/java/tira folder.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add partial Javadoc as a test

commitResults.messageBody: Modified gradle to accommodate JUnit testing. Created TaskListTest and UiTest classes and ran the testing code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify build.gradle to allow for jar file creation
commitResults.messageBody: Added required plugins and changed the mainClassName.

# Conflicts:
#	build.gradle
#	gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.properties

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments to half of the class
commitResults.messageBody: Added JavaDoc comments for all classes except for TaskList, Parser, Ui and Deadline

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify code to follow coding standard
commitResults.messageBody: Modified order of imports so that they are easier to read. Edited some spacing and comments.
Modified TaskList and Parser to handle find method. Parser checked if the command is "find" and TaskList checked which tasks are matching. Ui in TaskList prints out the matching tasks.

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/java/tira/task/TaskList.java
Edited the case-switch block in Ui if the command is event. Previously it was addDeadline() instead of addEvent

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug in TaskList and add Launcher and Main classes for JavaFX
commitResults.messageBody: Fix problem where findTask is not found in TaskList class. Added skeleton for launcher and Main class to commit before further changes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix build.gradle for Step 1 GUI tutorial
Modify Main, DialogBox, and Application according to Step 2 JavaFX tutorial
commitResults.messageBody: Added formatting codes in Main, DialogBox so that it looks like a chat box. Also added images for the user and the chatbot.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify DialogBox, MainWindow, Main classes and add MainWindow and DialogBox fxml
commitResults.messageBody: Added the appropriate codes in the DialogBox, MainWindow, Main classes and incorporated fxml to fix the chatbot app appearance. Used SceneBuilder to modify background color of the input box.

No checks on the coding style and quality.

Coding style and readability is important.

Adding checkstyle plugin.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions for task number during marking and unmarking tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Marking and unmarking tasks don't check for positive task number. This
could lead to indexing error while accessing the tasks from the
ArrayList of tasks.

Let's use assertion to ensure that the task number being marked and
unmarked is positive and non-zero in the taskList class.

Also refactored several import lines.

There are multiple indentation, organisation, and lack of javadoc
comments in the entire code.

This reduces readability for other users.

Let's use CheckStyle plugin of Gradle to improve the coding style.

This improves the efficiency in rectifying the coding style.

Several variables are not descriptive and might confuse readers
regarding their function. Several variables are also not used.

Let's standardise variables by:
1. Having all Ui methods that print messages start with show.
2. Specify how the commands are split based on their regex.

Additional variables are also added to improve readability.
Deleted conflicting import statements in UiTest task
Add assertions for task number during marking and unmarking tasks in TaskList class

commitResults.messageTitle: Add missing variables and arguments to TaskList methods
commitResults.messageBody:
Argument initially named splitCommand missing from the TaskList methods,
causing indexing errors.

Let's add back the arguments and rename them to commandSplitBySpace
to make it more descriptive to readers.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug where not all lines from text file are read
commitResults.messageBody:
Only one line of the text file is read and it is read multiple times.
This leads to inaccurate ArrayList of Tasks extracted from the file.
There is no new line character added to the text lines, causing the
task sentences to be combined in a single line in the text file.

Let's remove the duplicate readLine() method of bufferedReader in the
load() method of Storage and add "\n" to the task sentences.

Also fix coding quality issues including indentation, white spaces
and refactoring startDate and endDate to two separate methods in
Storage class.

There are no methods that summarises the statistics of the tasks.
Having statistics will be useful for users to gauge their progress
without looking at each task specifically.

Let's,
* use a Statistics class to store and calculate the statistics of the
tasks
* add showStatistics() in Ui class to display the statistics in String
form

Separate Statistics class will provide abstraction, allowing for easier
modification of statistics method in the future. Having Ui show the
statistics also help abstraction, allowing Ui to handle most printing
tasks to the users.

Also modifies several formatting issues for dates of tasks that led
to indexing and formatting errors.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix GUI format not showing picture properly
commitResults.messageBody:
GUI top pane hides the previous messages and profile picture. This
prevents user from seeing the previous messages clearly.

Let's fix this by replacing the fmxl file with the original fmxl file,
then tweak the design using Scene Builder.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix GUI not reflecting Tira functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
GUI only mirrors the user's command but does not process them. This
limits the functionality of the chatbot.

Let's
* modify the Ui class to be able to return a String.
* modify the Tira getResponse() method so it returns a String.
* modify the MainWindow to handle bye and other commands.

This will ensure that a String is sent back to the GUI, without
modifying much of the existing implementation.

Text box border overlaps with the font, making it difficult to read.

Let's modify the DialogBox fmxl so that the border is less rounded and
has space from the font. Let's also add Tira the Cafe Cat description
to the stage.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add more exception handling for Task classes
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no exception to handle lack of description and dates for ToDo,
Deadline and Event classes. This causes the tasks to still be recorded
in the TaskList despite the error, which leads to formatting errors
for other methods. Delete method also doesn't handle number input
being smaller than TaskList size.

Let's handle these through these methods:
* check if there's 1 or more word after todo command.
* check if the 2nd word in deadline doesn't start with / which indicates
date.
* check if command after split using slash creates an array of more than
2 words.
* conduct similar check for Event as with Deadline class.
* check if the size of the TaskList is greater than the deleted task
number.

Also refactor several lines using substring to differentiate /from, /to,
and /by using extractAfterWord method in TaskList.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Exception handling for invalid task number for mark and unmark
commitResults.messageBody:
The mark and unmark doesn't handle cases where the number in user input
is greater than the task list or when number is not included in the
command.

Let's add Exception for these cases by checking against the TaskList
size.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add product screenshot, minor bug fixes and Checkstyle
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no product screenshot yet and multiple coding style violation,
the latter reducing the readability of the code.

Let's use Checkstyle to rectify the coding style and add product
screenshot into the docs folder.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix Statistics bug and Add User Guide
commitResults.messageBody:
Statistics calculate tasks wrongly and there is no user guide. This
makes the statistics result inaccurate. Users cannot operate the
application freely without the user guide.

Let's refactor the Statistics addition of tasks to a single method
and marked or unmarked tasks to another method to make it easier
to read and modify in the future. We also add user guide based on the
commands that the users can input.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exit, save and editing guide in the user guide
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no guide on how to exit or save the data in the current user
guide.

Let's add the commands and formats for exit and instructions on how
to save the data.

Statistics don't have JavaDoc that explains the methods and
constructors, which will make users confused.

Let's add JavaDoc to the methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update DialogBox to have images with square ratio
commitResults.messageBody:
Image is not in a square ratio which does not look neat to users.

Let's set display picture width and hight to 100 and keep the ratio in
DialogBox.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix wrong format for exit command in readme
commitResults.messageBody:
Exit command is "exit" instead of "bye"

Let's replace the "exit" format to "bye"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Exception handling for incorrect LocalDate format
commitResults.messageBody:
There is improper exception handling for incorrect LocalDate input by
user in deadline and event. User might not understand where they went
wrong.

Let's throw a TiraException with appropriate message so the exception
is handled more elegantly.

Also remove redundant properties in Tira class.
